an6.19:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava natike viharati ginjakavasathe.
an6.19:1.6: “maranassati, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana.
an6.19:2.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.19:2.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an6.19:2.5: ‘aho vataham rattindivam jiveyyam, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:2.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an6.19:3.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an6.19:3.5: ‘aho vataham divasam jiveyyam, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:3.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an6.19:4.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an6.19:4.5: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram ekapindapatam bhunjami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:4.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an6.19:5.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an6.19:5.5: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram cattaro panca alope sankhaditva ajjhoharami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:5.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an6.19:6.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an6.19:6.5: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram ekam alopam sankhaditva ajjhoharami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:6.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an6.19:7.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an6.19:7.5: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram assasitva va passasami passasitva va assasami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:7.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an6.19:8.1: Evam vutte, bhagava te bhikkhu etadavoca:
an6.19:8.2: “yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an6.19:8.3: ‘aho vataham rattindivam jiveyyam, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:9.1: Yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an6.19:9.2: ‘aho vataham divasam jiveyyam, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:10.1: Yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an6.19:10.2: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram ekapindapatam bhunjami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:11.1: Yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an6.19:11.2: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram cattaro panca alope sankhaditva ajjhoharami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:12.1: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pamatta viharanti dandham maranassatim bhaventi asavanam khayaya.
an6.19:13.1: Yo ca khvayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an6.19:13.2: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram ekam alopam sankhaditva ajjhoharami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:14.1: Yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an6.19:14.2: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram assasitva va passasami passasitva va assasami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an6.19:15.1: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appamatta viharanti tikkham maranassatim bhaventi asavanam khayaya.
an6.19:16.2: ‘appamatta viharissama, tikkham maranassatim bhavessama asavanam khayaya’ti.
